rules_text:
{2}: Atieh’s Disciple gains flying, vigilance, or lifelink until end of turn.
Whenever another Angel or Nephilim you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Atieh’s Disciple.
Surpass {4}{W}{U} [i]({4}{W}{U}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Flying, vigilance, lifelink
Whenever Atieh’s Favored attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Angel or Nephilim creature you control.
